mapper.select: SELECT r.re_regdate, r.re_price, p.pro_name, po.pro_opt_size, pi.pro_loc, re_id FROM r_product r INNER JOIN product_option po ON r.product_option_pro_opt_id = po.pro_opt_id INNER JOIN member m ON m.mem_id = r.member_mem_id INNER JOIN product p ON p.pro_id = po.product_pro_id INNER JOIN pro_image pi on pi.product_pro_id = p.pro_id AND pi.pro_loc like('%medium%') WHERE m.mem_id = #{mem_id}
